summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces multiple new UI sections/components and enhancements to a portfolio page, which are not grounded in any explicit request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new portfolio sections/components: CertificationsSection, HighlightsSection, and LanguagesSection and integrated them into PortfolioPage navigation and layout.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; these additions are new scope without an explicit request.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced hero section with badges, background image, smooth scroll CTA, and resume download button usage.
Enhanced contact section with conditional contact items (phone/linkedin/github/website), clickable cards, external-link behavior, and expanded CTA copy.
Modified experience and skills sections for new visual hierarchy and added labels/badges (e.g., "Current Role"), plus additional descriptive copy.
Introduced/updated resumeContent-driven dynamic rendering across sections and added/expanded structured resume content (training, languages, etc.).
Added runtime asset availability checking (useAssetAvailability hook) and "ResumeDownloadButton" behavior per file summaries.
